name: A Google user
review: Confusing for tourists with tourist tickets that are restricted to lines operated by certain companies. The app doesn't give information about the operators. I ended up with a multi-stop connection where the bus driver refused my ticket and I had to travel back to take a different connection.

name: Ozgur Kalkan
review: It's a good app, more like an essential one, but the trams and trains always change routes and there is always something wrong resulting in me either getting late or not getting there at all.

name: gabs igab
review: Excellent app I have used it on our visit to Amsterdam and was excellent. Great help to have with you. Good info, accurate, reliable. Good planner also.

name: Damian
review: It works very well for traveling. I use it everyday.

name: Pel Pan
review: very bad accuracy and often not the shortest way

name: Paulo Waisberg
review: We will see so far so good

name: Paul-Peter Theulings
review: Een verbeterpuntje. "Tap the + button in the bottom right to plan your trip". Haal dat maar weg en ga meteen door naar de planning, zoals andere reisapps het ook doen.

name: Tom Thomasson
review: Werkt erg counterintuïtief. Als ik de dienstregeling van een specifieke lijn probeer te vinden, deze vervolgens selecteer, dan kan ik deze slechts in 1 richting plannen.

name: A Google user
review: Slecht zie te je locatie niet meer waardeloos

name: Florin Fira
review: App crashes, unusable. Cannot log in into my account too. What a waste of time.

name: A Google user
review: Version 3.3 is working now after my complaint has been dealt with...

name: A Google user
review: Useless. Can not search for stops in the trip planner. Very occasionally a stop shows up but vanishes when next character is typed.

name: John Harig
review: This app crashes after a few searches. It states that it cannot download location and it cant find any location in a search. I have to delete and reinstall the app each time. It is laughable how bad this is considering how many developers live in amsterdam.

name: Cenon Del Rosario
review: Very useless app, why is location required and not just search for places? Cannot even offer extensive places when searching, FAIL!

name: Tom Wahlicht
review: Searching for stops does not work, Autocomplete stops not working as well. Therefore it is pretty much useless

name: Alexander Dugdale
review: Unable to input departure location and destination. App will not search for locations when i type into the search bar

name: Mahdi Abd
review: This app doesn't work.... The basic task like list the destination and auto suggestions stations never worked for me

name: Stefan Simon
review: The main feature, planning a trip, does not work because searching for stations shows no results! Fix it ASAP

name: Marco van Dijk
review: No real time departure info for buses

name: A Google user
review: The main feature to plan a ride doesn't work. You need to fix it.

name: Ramy Taha
review: Doesn't search for station names!!!!! Awful

name: Gaius Octavius
review: waardeloze app. niet gebruiksvriendelijk.   Ander app OVinfo; deze werkt veel beter zonder registratie zonder gps.

name: Simon Prosser
review: Very slow. 80% of time it doesn't work.  Poor user interface.

name: Anton Hein-Hudson
review: I'm impressed with this GVB app and the depth of information available. It is well organized and info is easy to find.  One of the most useful features for me is the fact that it provides real-time departure times.  The app is fast and reliable.

name: Denilson Sá Maia
review: The app might have been useful, if it weren't SO SLOW! You see the rotating circle (indicating "loading") everywhere, for every action you do. And it takes too long to finish loading anything (even on Wi-Fi). I spent more time looking at the loading circle than looking at the information I wanted.

name: Hisham Ghosheh
review: It would be really great to have a widget that displays departures for selected metro lines.

name: A Google user
review: App only in dutch, no more than 10 words need to be translated , why not translate?

name: Kristel Bronswinkel
review: With every update the app gets worse. I rather use 9292ov

name: Jean-Camille LOISEAU
review: No English? In 2014? In a European capital? :(

name: Mike H.
review: No English version - Useless to me
